titles.title: A resolution to amend Senate Resolution 352, agreed to April 11, 1986, relating to the commemoration of the bicentennial of the Senate of the United States.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 2/19/1988--Introduced. Amends Senate Resolution 352, 99th Congress, to authorize the Commission on the Bicentennial of the United States Senate to procure the temporary or intermittent services of consultants. Authorizes the Commission to engage the services of guest speakers and provide them with appropriate honoraria, transportation expenses, and per diem in lieu of subsistence.
